name: Hair Ballz - Cat Ball Attack on Crazy Angry Mice
name_original: Hair Ballz - Cat Ball Attack on Crazy Angry Mice
description:
Cats and Hair Balls! Or is that Ballz??? Nasty business, regardless, except when they use their special gift to zap rats and freakish mice. Yeah, that’s right – they clean house by getting rid of those pesky pests with hair balls!

Shoot hair balls at rodents and household items like bombs! Yikes! Run like crazy but don’t let anything stand in your way!

Gather coins to unlock new characters.

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Hair Ballz’ Now!!!
